snippet: The struggling Japanese consumer electronics giant Sharp said it would receive a $120 million investment from Qualcomm in a two-part deal that would make the American company one of Sharp's biggest shareholders.
abstract: The struggling Japanese consumer electronics giant Sharp said it would receive a $120 million investment from Qualcomm in a two-part deal that would make the American company one of Sharp's biggest shareholders.

headline.main: Qualcomm Acquires a Stake in Sharp
